text: She's making her television debut in the upcoming period drama The Alienist. But Dakota Fanning looked every inch the movie star as she commanded attention on the red carpet of the 2018 SAG Awards in Los Angeles on Sunday. The 23 - year - old acting ingenue wore an elegant pink strapless gown for her entrance at The Shrine Auditorium. Scroll down for video Pretty in pink : Dakota Fanning, 23, looked every inch the movie star as she commanded attention on the red carpet of the 2018 SAG Awards in Los Angeles on Sunday Daring to impress, the War Of The World alum looked ravishing in the couture number that flaunted her enviable figure. The pink hued fabric had a ruched effect as the strapless number highlighted her delicate decolletage. A
